(:action cook
    :parameters (?npc - player ?resource1 - item ?resource2 - item ?tool1 - item ?tool2 - item)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?tool2) (at ?resource1 ?tool2) (at ?resource2 ?tool2) 
                       (is_tool1 ?tool1) (is_tool2 ?tool2) (is_raw ?resource1) (is_raw ?resource2))
    :effect (and (processed ?resource1) (processed ?resource2) (dirty ?tool1))

(:action drink
  ; Action to drink a liquid from a source and update the entity's state
  :parameters (?npc - person ?source - item ?liquid - liquid)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?source) (is_source ?source) (contains ?source ?liquid) (power_on ?source))
  :effect (hydrated ?npc)
)

(:action add ; Add an item to a container or location
    :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object ?container - object ?location - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?npc ?location) 
        (at ?item ?location) 
        (at ?container ?location) 
        (is_container ?container) 
        (is_item ?item) 
        (is_location ?location) 
        (clean ?container) 
        (suitable ?location))
    :effect (and 
        (item_in_container ?item ?container) 
        (dirty ?container) 
        (modified ?container))

(:action finish ; Complete a task or process for an entity
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?entity - item)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?entity) (in_progress ?entity))
    :effect (and (completed ?entity))
